DERBY-4336: Remove Blob and Clob interface methods from the list of unsupported methods in UnsupportedVetter. Removed now implemented methods in the Blob/Clob JDBC interface from the list of unsupported methods in jdbc4.UnsupportedVetter. Also removed the update[BC]lob-methods in the ResultSet interface.
